output: html_document
<!----->
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```
```{r}
data(mpg)
```
```{r}
glimpse(mpg)
```
```{r}
View(mpg)
```
```{r}
table(mpg$manufacturer)
```
```{r}
ggplot(data=mpg)+geom_point(mapping =aes( x = displ, y = hwy))
```
```{r}
ggplot(data=mpg)+geom_point(mapping = aes(x=displ,y=hwy,color=class))
```
